DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety efficacy long-term use AL-4943A ( Olopatadine Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution , 0.2 % ) patient allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Long-Term Study With AL-4943A Ophthalmic Solution , 0.2 % Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Subjects must provide write consent . Subjects must diagnosis allergic conjunctivitis . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Itching and/or hyperemia associate diseases allergic conjunctivitis . Retinal detachment , diabetic retinopathy , progressive disease posterior segment eye . Known history ocular infection . Contact lens wear study . Pregnant , nursing . Participation another clinical study within 30 day Informed Consent . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
